Available concentrations are an avg. by date (n grab = 6, n net = 2), not individual pairs. grab samples had higher proportion of non-fibers than net samples. Net fibers wider but not longer than grab fibers. Volumes are estimated based on submerged net opening & tow distance. fiber percent is average for entire study.

Available numbers are an avg. by date (n grab = 5, n net = 2), not individual pairs. grab samples had higher proportion of non-fibers than net samples. Net fibers wider but not longer than grab fibers. Volumes are estimated based on submerged net opening & tow distance. fiber percent is average for entire study.
